issue_highlights_audio::title: Kubijanye n’ingorane
issue_highlights_audio::clip_card_4::goa: Erekana akandi karorero gahimbaye kadasa n’ubundi kadondora ingorane hamwe n’ingaruka
issue_highlights_audio::clip_card_5::goa: Fata amajwi yakandi karorero gahambaye kadasa n’ubundi kadondora ingorane hamwe n’inkurikizi
issue_highlights_audio::clip_card_6::goa: Fata ingaruka z’ingorane. erekana ingene ivyo bishikira imice.
issue_highlights_audio::clip_card_2::goa: Fata ijwi ritanga incamake y’ingorane n’inkurikizi yayo.
issue_highlights_audio::clip_card_0::goa: Fata ikibanza aho abantu bariko bavuga iyo ngorane
issue_highlights_audio::clip_card_7::goa: Turamaze gukora ikintu kijanye niyo ngorane ? fata icahindutse.
issue_highlights_audio::text_card_0::tex: Nimba hari ibice birenga bitatu,mutegerzwa kongereza ubwaguke bwububiko.
issue_highlights_audio::clip_card_3::goa: Fata akarorero gahambaye cane kadondora ingorane hamwe n’inkurikizi.
